title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description:
Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'

2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3. Select xxx as destination5.
OB: When performing the 'copy package' operation in jdt.ui3, selecting xxx as the destination results in an unexpected behavior.
EB: The expected behavior is that the destination should be 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open jdt.ui3.
2. Perform the 'copy package' operation.
3. Select xxx as the destination.

Expected result: The destination should be 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
